comment.author: 90186759@N04
comment._content:
I know two of the people in this photo. The man on the far left is Jack King. The woman on the far right is his wife of 70 years, Mrs Ellen King (nee May). They are my husband's grandparents. I talked to them both at their 70th anniversary party. They said they remember it was an event for the Green Acres Kiwanis foundation. They also agreed that it was in the early 40s. Probably after they were married in 1942 but before their first son was born in 1945. They couldn't recall the names of the people they were sitting with. Jack was one of the original founders of King and May Electric, which later became King Electric.
Amanda King

comment.author: 23686862@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/90186759@N04] Hi Amanda, that is fantastic, thank you so much for solving this mystery for us! We're curious to know how you came across the photo?
comment.authorname: Galt Museum & Archives on The Commons

comment.author: 90186759@N04
comment._content: I love old photos and I have had the Galt Flickr page bookmarked for a while. I was actually looking at the old pictures you have of Henderson Lake on the site when I decided to flip through the more recent posts.  Coincidentally I had just finished making a slide show for Jack and Ellen's 70th anniversary party or I would never have recognized them.
